text:
@JoeBiden Our town is being attacked and Trump won't do or say anything to help.
My son is trapped and my disabled ass can't do a damned thing.
Who will have the balls to do or say something to stop this.?
People are being injured and businesses ruined. Covid19 has nothing on these riots
